channel.title: I feel like a fing noob asking this but here it goes... look here lol
channel.description:
alright, im making an interactive map.. and i want the map to switch once somethign is clicked.. for instance, if i click on a city, i want another pic with the city to show up, but i just cant get the ImageIcon to update..
i have something like this in my mouseClicked method lol check this out: [code] map.clicked(x, y); //cooords of where was clicked so map can process em mapPic = new ImageIcon(map.getCurImage()); //gets the current image on the map.. picHolder = new JLabel(mapPic); //this is the jlabel that is supposed to be updated.. [/code]
OMG i feel so freakin gay but can someone tell me how to change the pic.. becaise i tried repainting the whole thing but then my menu doesnt get painted on there because its not added to the repaint method and it makes me mad...

isnt there a seticon method?

if there is, ill kiss you!!

lol and tehre is a bug with the remove method… lol i tried both remove(index) and remove(comp)… they dont work… it just adds the second pic along with the first one, i tried adding validate but that doesnt help…

ty for the suggestion lol, ill try setIcon[br][size=1]Posted on: September 03, 2007, 06:59:49 PM[/size][hr]omg ty… it works… .lol ty both for helping!!!

item.title: I feel like a fing noob asking this but here it goes... look here lol
item.dc:creator: @pizza_pie pizza pie
item.description:
@pizza_pie wrote:

alright, im making an interactive map… and i want the map to switch once somethign is clicked… for instance, if i click on a city, i want another pic with the city to show up, but i just cant get the ImageIcon to update…

i have something like this in my mouseClicked method
lol check this out:

         map.clicked(x, y);                  //cooords of where was clicked so map can process em
         mapPic = new ImageIcon(map.getCurImage());           //gets the current image on the map..
         picHolder = new JLabel(mapPic);                  //this is the jlabel that is supposed to be updated..

OMG i feel so freakin gay but can someone tell me how to change the pic… becaise i tried repainting the whole thing but then my menu doesnt get painted on there because its not added to the repaint method and it makes me mad…
